content: Spandan Roy - IIIT Hyderabad CONTACT Menu Spandan Roy Assistant Professor, Ph.D (IIT Delhi) Email: spandan.roy[at]iiit.ac.in Publications Institute Webpage Personal homepage Research areas Adaptive-robust control, time-delayed control (with artificial delay), sliding mode control, control applications to robotics. Research Centers/Labs Robotics Research Center (RRC) works on research problems and innovative projects that extend the state of the art in robotics.
